fields.description:
h3.Feature Request
Preventing vertical movement of entire table view after scrolling to bottom of table view.

h6.UIScrollView is the superclass of several UIKit classes including UITableView and UITextView.

http://developer.apple.com/library/ios/#documentation/UIKit/Reference/UIScrollView_Class/Reference/UIScrollView.html
fields.summary: iOS: Disable UITableView vertical bounces when scrolling
